mapper.insert: insert into service_personnel (service_id, name, password, age, gender, phone, specialtyid, native_place, work_experience, categoryid, level, chargestandard, work_city, rate, photo, video, myself, education, training, health, reward, commission, stores_id, service_stauts, program_code, service_grade, service_upline, ssionsid) values (#{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialtyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workExperience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chargestandard,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{myself,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{training,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{health,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{storesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceStauts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceUpline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ssionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update service_personnel set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specialtyid = #{specialtyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, native_place = #{nativePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_experience = #{workExperience,jdbcType=INTEGER}, categoryid = #{categoryid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level = #{level,jdbcType=CHAR}, chargestandard = #{chargestandard,jdbcType=INTEGER}, work_city = #{workCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video = #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, myself = #{myself,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, training = #{training,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, health = #{health,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reward = #{reward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commission = #{commission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stores_id = #{storesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, service_stauts = #{serviceStauts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, program_code = #{programCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_grade = #{serviceGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, service_upline = #{serviceUpline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ssionsid = #{ssionsid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select service_id, name, password, age, gender, phone, specialtyid, native_place, work_experience, categoryid, level, chargestandard, work_city, rate, photo, video, myself, education, training, health, reward, commission, stores_id, service_stauts, program_code, service_grade, service_upline, ssionsid from service_personnel where service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
